messages.title: The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain. We will put more police on patrols, smaller class sizes, start restoring fair pay for the armed forces.

messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats run many of our biggest cities including Liverpool, Sheffield and Bristol. Won more votes than Labour in the last elections. Are stronger now than at any time since 1923. Can deliver real change across Britain.

messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg's tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: OUR NHS: At risk with the Conservatives
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.
issues.education: We will put more police on patrols, smaller class sizes.
issues.health: OUR NHS: At risk with the Conservatives. Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss.

leaflet.personalStatement: A local campaigner in the national spotlight. A track record of getting things done. 25+ years' experience.

politicalExperience.achievements: Working with Vince Cable on Treasury Select Committee.

contactInformation.address: Stone Liberal Democrats, 31 Green Lane, Eccleshall, Stafford ST21 6BB

images.caption: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
